Under the new "deport now, appeal later" initiative, these individuals will have to participate in appeal hearings remotely from India.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-joins-uk-list-whose-citizens-can-be-deported-before-appeal/articleshow/123245480.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-joins-uk-list-whose-citizens-can-be-deported-before-appeal/articleshow/123245480.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 04:03:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NAOMI CANTON</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1036368" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123245520,imgsize-1036368.cms"/></item><item><title>US extends China tariff truce by 90 days; Trump-Xi summit on cards?</title><description><![CDATA[President Trump has extended the trade truce with China for 90 days, delaying tariff escalations and export controls. This extension aims to provide more time for Washington and Beijing to resolve trade disputes and potentially arrange a summit between Trump and Xi Jinping later this year. While negotiations continue, analysts remain cautious about the prospects for a final deal.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/theyve-been-dealing-quite-nicely-us-extends-china-tariff-truce-by-90-days-trump-xi-summit-on-cards/articleshow/123247872.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/theyve-been-dealing-quite-nicely-us-extends-china-tariff-truce-by-90-days-trump-xi-summit-on-cards/articleshow/123247872.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 07:29:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="913875" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123247877,imgsize-913875.cms"/></item><item><title>Pakistan Army chief Asim Munir threatens to target RIL's Jamnagar refinery</title><description><![CDATA[Pakistan's army chief, Asim Munir, threatened to target Reliance Industries' Jamnagar refinery in Gujarat during a future conflict with India, signaling a shift towards hitting economic assets. Munir referenced a social media post featuring Mukesh Ambani and a Quranic verse, implying an aerial attack on the refinery, which symbolizes India's economic power and refining capacity.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pakistan-army-chief-asim-munir-threatens-to-target-rils-jamnagar-refinery/articleshow/123245358.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pakistan-army-chief-asim-munir-threatens-to-target-rils-jamnagar-refinery/articleshow/123245358.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 03:50:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1129885" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123245390,imgsize-1129885.cms"/></item><item><title>R Ashwin falls victim to Virat Kohli number scam — Here’s what happened</title><description><![CDATA[Phone number mix-ups create problems for cricketers. A man in Chhattisgarh got Rajat Patidar's old number. He then received calls from Virat Kohli and AB de Villiers. R Ashwin also shared his experience. Someone impersonated Devon Conway and asked for Kohli's number. Ashwin tested the person and found out it was a fake account. These incidents highlight impersonation risks.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/r-ashwin-falls-victim-to-virat-kohli-number-scam-heres-what-happened/articleshow/123247953.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/r-ashwin-falls-victim-to-virat-kohli-number-scam-heres-what-happened/articleshow/123247953.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 07:48:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1049396" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123247974,imgsize-1049396.cms"/></item><item><title>Texas shooting: 3 dead at Austin's Target store; gunman arrested</title><description><![CDATA[In a tragic incident in Austin, a gunman opened fire in a Target parking lot, resulting in three fatalities. The suspect, described as a man in his 30s with a mental health history, stole two vehicles before being apprehended by police. The attack unfolded during busy shopping hours, causing widespread panic.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/texas-shooting-3-killed-in-austins-target-parking-lot-gunman-with-mental-health-history-held/articleshow/123247923.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/texas-shooting-3-killed-in-austins-target-parking-lot-gunman-with-mental-health-history-held/articleshow/123247923.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 07:42:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1054131" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123248041,imgsize-1054131.cms"/></item><item><title>Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella to staff: Not enough to be a software factory; calls for innovation</title><description><![CDATA[Microsoft is undergoing a significant shift, transitioning from a software manufacturer to an "intelligence engine," according to CEO Satya Nadella. This transformation aims to democratize AI, empowering global users to create their own intelligent tools. Microsoft will focus on building AI systems that enable individuals and organizations to develop customized solutions, redesigning its technology stack to support this new vision.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-ceo-satya-nadella-to-employees-its-no-longer-enough-to-be-software-factory-must-become/articleshow/123230971.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-ceo-satya-nadella-to-employees-its-no-longer-enough-to-be-software-factory-must-become/articleshow/123230971.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 12:34:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1442730" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123230971,imgsize-1442730.cms"/></item><item><title>Top stocks to buy or sell: Stock market recommendations for today - check list</title><description><![CDATA[Stock market recommendations: Mirae Asset Sharekhan suggests selling Hindustan Zinc, citing a break of a flag pattern and downward trendline, targeting Rs 390. Conversely, L&T is a buy recommendation, as it broke a consolidation and resumed its uptrend, with a target of Rs 3800.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/top-stock-recommendations-for-august-12-2025-hindustan-zinc-larsen-and-toubro-lt-stocks-to-buy-or-sell-today/articleshow/123236072.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/top-stock-recommendations-for-august-12-2025-hindustan-zinc-larsen-and-toubro-lt-stocks-to-buy-or-sell-today/articleshow/123236072.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 07:30:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="93070" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123236093,imgsize-93070.cms"/></item><item><title>43 people still missing in Uttarkashi flash floods, says govt in first official note</title><description><![CDATA[Following the devastating flash flood in Dharali on August 5th, officials report 43 people still missing amidst warnings of more heavy rainfall in Uttarkashi until August 15th, potentially hindering search and relief efforts. A joint task force is navigating unstable terrain to find those trapped, while road repairs are underway despite weather challenges.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/uttarakhand-43-people-still-missing-in-dharali-flash-floods-says-govt-in-first-official-note/articleshow/123245886.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/uttarakhand-43-people-still-missing-in-dharali-flash-floods-says-govt-in-first-official-note/articleshow/123245886.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 04:37:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GAURAV TALWAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="232128" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123245915,imgsize-232128.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: When history knocked, India left the door ajar</title><description><![CDATA[India’s 2-2 draw in the inaugural Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy was a series of high drama, spectacular comebacks, and glaring missed opportunities. Shubman Gill’s young side matched England punch for punch but faltered in the fundamentals — from dropped catches to inconsistent bowling — leaving what could have been a historic series win just out of reach.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/anderson-tendulkar-trophy-india-should-have-been-celebrating-a-series-win-in-england-instead-have-gaps-to-fill-for-future/articleshow/123248228.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/anderson-tendulkar-trophy-india-should-have-been-celebrating-a-series-win-in-england-instead-have-gaps-to-fill-for-future/articleshow/123248228.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 08:07:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TANUJ LAKHINA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="104786" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123248261,imgsize-104786.cms"/></item><item><title>Why neighbours are 'concerned' with Mark Zuckerberg buying houses in Palo Alto?</title><description><![CDATA[Mark Zuckerberg's real estate acquisitions in Palo Alto's Crescent Park, totaling over $110 million, have sparked concerns among neighbors. Extensive renovations, including subterranean spaces, have disrupted the neighborhood's peace. Residents feel the community's spirit has diminished due to the billionaire's presence and perceived disregard for local norms, leading to accusations of exploiting loopholes in zoning laws.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/why-neighbours-are-concerned-with-mark-zuckerberg-buying-houses-in-palo-alto-the-place-that-has-been-house-to-steve-jobs-and-other-tech-execs/articleshow/123239502.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/why-neighbours-are-concerned-with-mark-zuckerberg-buying-houses-in-palo-alto-the-place-that-has-been-house-to-steve-jobs-and-other-tech-execs/articleshow/123239502.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 20:10:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23578" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123239494,imgsize-23578.cms"/></item><item><title>Zelenskyy dials PM Modi, seeks support ahead of Trump-Putin meet</title><description><![CDATA[Amidst escalating efforts to resolve the Russia-Ukraine war, PM Modi and President Zelenskyy engaged in discussions, with Zelenskyy advocating for limitations on Russian energy exports. Modi reiterated India's commitment to a peaceful resolution and offered support for strengthening bilateral ties. Zelenskyy also expressed his desire to meet Modi in September at the UNGA sidelines in New York.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/zelensky-dials-pm-seeks-support-ahead-of-trump-putin-meet/articleshow/123247202.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/zelensky-dials-pm-seeks-support-ahead-of-trump-putin-meet/articleshow/123247202.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 06:22:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SACHIN PARASHAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="571331" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123247231,imgsize-571331.cms"/></item><item><title>'Yes, I do': Georgina Rodríguez confirms engagement to Cristiano Ronaldo</title><description><![CDATA[Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodríguez are engaged, marking a significant step in their relationship. They have since built a family, including daughters Alana Martina and Bella Esmeralda, with Georgina also raising Ronaldo's other children.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/yes-i-do-georgina-rodrguez-confirms-engagement-to-cristiano-ronaldo/articleshow/123247061.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/yes-i-do-georgina-rodrguez-confirms-engagement-to-cristiano-ronaldo/articleshow/123247061.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 06:18:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="328942" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123247071,imgsize-328942.cms"/></item><item><title>How much Ronaldo’s engagement ring for Georgina really costs?</title><description><![CDATA[Cristiano Ronaldo, 40, and Georgina Rodriguez, 31, are engaged!
